Biography

Biography

èµ¤æ˜Ÿé‡Œå¥ˆ

Rina Akaboshi

Rina Akaboshi is a classical concert pianist. Although her forte is German music, her recent focus has been on broadening her repertoire with French and Russian music. She has a reputation for pursuing a mature expression and deep musicality, while exploring techniques in-depth to discover the ideal touch to bring out new possibilities in every tone. After receiving numerous awards in both national and international competitions, in 2018, her first solo album, â€œNeue Welt â€“ New Worldâ€ was released. Her concert activities continue while studying under Mr. Yuya Tsuda, one of the most appreciated pianists in Japan, at Tokyo Art University (Graduate-level special course).
